<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// addPassesToEmitMC - Add passes to the specified pass manager to get</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegentargetmachineimpl/#a6070d53ab3c5060589362b14a68b17f0"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codegentargetmachineimpl/#a6070d53ab3c5060589362b14a68b17f0">CodeGenTargetMachineImpl::addPassesToEmitMC</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacy/passmanagerbase">PassManagerBase</a> &amp;PM,</span></CodeLine>
